steps.text: Who first brought Nashville's music to the world?

These eight symbols capture the essence of Tennessee, from resilient flowers and towering trees to tenacious wildlife and the very rock beneath our feet. Find where they stand in full display and note their order. Arrange them correctly to decode their secret to preserve Tennesseeâ€™s legacy.
steps.shortText: Arrange the symbols correctly to decode their secret.
